name: Revive & Prosper
storyline:
Martians took the last cow on Earth! And they're coming back for ransom. Choose to obey, share resources and trade them or choose to disobey and fight Martians and their monster pets.
Build a spaceship and fly off into space for the rescue mission.
summary: A voxel automation game where you'll enjoy deep technical challenges and detailed simulations. Extract resources, construct an advanced automated base using belts and smart water control, and manage complex production chains. Whether you prefer to chill and build at your own pace or ramp up the difficulty by facing off against enemies, the choice is yours. Revive the land and master resource management to build the ultimate spaceport and launch into the stars.
